span.p: All CPSB schools will remain closed through the remainder of the school year. All CPSB teachers now have Blackboard Websites. Blackboard is an online means for teachers to post resources for their students. To reach your child’s teacher’s Blackboard Website, go to www.cpsb.org then click on “Our Schools” to select the school then click on the “Faculty” tab.

a.title: Go to comments for Coronavirus Update

div.p: Out of Zone Permits are available beginning today. Permits can be obtained by sending an email to cwainfo@cpsb.org.

a.title: Go to comments for Out of Zone Permits

div.p: The CPSB district calendar for the 2020-2021 school year has been released. Click HERE for the printable calendar.

a.title: Go to comments for CPSB 2020-2021 Calendar is Now Available

img.alt: CPSB Named Interim Head Start Provider over Beauregard Head Start

a.span: CPSB Named Interim Head Start Provider over Beauregard Head Start

div.p: Beginning February 3, 2020, the Calcasieu Parish School Board will be the new provider for the Head Start Program in Beauregard Parish. Transition Details

a.title: Go to comments for CPSB Named Interim Head Start Provider over Beauregard Head Start

a.span: Calcasieu Parish School Board again receives financial reporting award

div.p: The Certificate of Achievement for Excellence in Financial Reporting has been awarded to the Calcasieu Parish School Board by Government Finance Officers Association of the United States and Canada (GFOA) for its comprehensive annual financial report (CAFR). About the Award

a.title: Go to comments for Calcasieu Parish School Board again receives financial reporting award

ul.li: Blackboard Web Community Manager Privacy Policy (Updated) |
